import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Dropdown, DropdownButton } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default () => { const [songs, setSongs] = useState([]); const [artists, setArtists] = useState([]); const [genres, setGenres] = useState([]); const data = {}; useEffect( async () => { data = await axios.get(process.env.API_URL); }); return( <>
Songs Artists Genres Last month Last 6 months All time
Rank Song/Artist/Genre
); }
